name: Death = Minions
description:
Use WASD to control the Player Character
Use Arrow Keys to control the minions

Just keep moving right!

A simple game I made for the newbies game jam using the theme "Death = Progress". 

This is the first games project I've finished to relative completion. On top of physics based player controllers, it also utilizes a dynamic camera system and a simple online leaderboard for players to compete against each other with.
